item.description:
If you want me to get the tickets I need your money by Sept. 17th. If someone else would like to be in charge of getting the tickets you can do it a little later. Please Make checks out to Carole Mednicov. In memo box put meet up & event date. Or let me know If you'd like to run the event. I suggest meeting at 6pm at La Cantina Italiana Restorante, 911 Waverly Street, Framingham 01701. Ph # (508) 879-7874. Everyone loved the restaurant the last time! Real old fashioned Italian cooking!!!  Kiki  ;-)

 

Amazing Things Ph# is (508) 405-2787. The web site to look up the event is amazingthings.org.
item.how_to_find_us: Preorder tickets if you want to go as a group. Tickets are $17. This is a Sat. night show.
item.name: Let's Go to see Thomas Pandolfi's "Into the Night with Gershwin"
